prompts.title: Update Parcel Type Definition
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working on a React and TypeScript codebase. Your current focus is on updating type definitions.

context.prdSummary: Add 'delivered_at' field to the Parcel type definition to support the new column in the table.
relevantRepoConventions: Prefer Ant Design components for consistent UI patterns.
evidence: The API response needs to include the 'delivered_at' field, which requires updating the type definition.

instructions: Add 'delivered_at: string' to the Parcel type definition in src/types/parcel.ts.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
ALWAYS follow existing code style
deliverables: The Parcel type includes the 'delivered_at' field.

guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers

prompts.title: Add 'Delivered At' Column to Parcels Page
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working on a React and TypeScript codebase. Your current focus is on UI modifications.

context.prdSummary: Modify the Parcels page to display the new 'Delivered At' column in the table, ensuring it is visible by default.
relevantRepoConventions: Prefer Ant Design components for consistent UI patterns.
evidence: The UI needs to display the new 'Delivered At' column as specified in the PRD.

instructions: Add a new column for 'Delivered At' in the table on src/pages/Parcels.tsx.
Ensure the column is visible by default.
Format the date as 'DD MMM YYYY, hh:mm A'.
Display 'Not Delivered' if the delivery date is not available.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
ALWAYS follow existing code style
Use Ant Design Table component for table rendering
deliverables: The 'Delivered At' column is visible and correctly formatted on the Parcels page.

deliverables: The TableRenderer can render and sort the 'Delivered At' column.
